duties_responsibilities.duty: Effectively lead the team of staff engineers, designers, and support staff to ensure timely completion of projects within budget.
Manage, mentor, and grow the junior engineering design team, as well as successfully manage the execution and completion of all engineering project phases.
Review, analyze, and solve design problems, recommend corrective actions for improvement, and adhere to established design guidelines and procedures.
Assist in the preparation of improvement plans, specifications, supporting documents, and permit applications for subdivisions, commercial developments, and public works projects.
Perform civil design analysis and calculations according to project requirements.
Increase the overall effectiveness of the team by developing staff, aligning individual team member strengths with appropriate project tasks, and identifying potential obstacles.
Delegate project tasks to team members in a timely fashion, provide clear direction, and establish clear deadlines with team member affirmation.

Assist in the preparation of calculations, such as storm drain, wastewater, water system, earthwork quantities, transportation, cost estimates, and other supporting documentation for public and private projects.
Set goals, evaluate junior engineering staff performance, and serve as a resource and mentor to the engineering staff.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering (Master's preferred)
